layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x416
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x416
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x400
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 600x400 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 598x398
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 598x394
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 594x394 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutTable {TABLE} at (2,2) size 590x390 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
                LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 588x388
                  LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 588x384
